alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski; Union (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 7:00AM CDT until July 19 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CDT FOR WESTERN UNION...NORTHWESTERN PULASKI...SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON... NORTHWESTERN ALEXANDER...SOUTHEASTERN PERRY AND NORTHEASTERN CAPE GIRARDEAU COUNTIES... At 700 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trail Of Tears State Park, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cape Girardeau, Jackson, Anna, Jonesboro, Trail Of Tears State Park, Dongola, Tamms, Grand Tower, Ware, Ullin, Pulaski, Pocahontas, Mill Creek and East Cape Girardeau. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 14 and 24. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 102 and 111. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
